# Roaring Drunk (Ex)
## Overview
*Roaring Drunk (Ex)*: While raging, the barbarian gains a +1 morale bonus on [[Intimidate (Skill)|Intimidate]] checks and to the save DC of any fear effects she creates for each alcoholic drink she has consumed during her rage, to a maximum of +1 per four barbarian levels.

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 76
